short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes unenroll and archive button from google classroom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prevents google students from unenrolling and or archive classes by removing the buttons from the webpage. Good solution for schools or parents that are having this issue. It is best to disable or remove the extension when the semester is over or classes need to actually be unenrolled or archived.
